item.title: Indian cumin worth almost Tk 10mn seized in Brahmanbaria’s Bijoynagar
item.description: The Border Guard Bangladesh (BGB) has seized 3,000kg of Indian cumin in an operation in Brahmanbaria’s Bijoynagar Upazila. Members of BGB-25 Battalion intercepted a truck loaded with the smuggled spices in the Islampur area on Tuesday, according to Lt Col Jabbar Ahmed, the unit's commander.
